name: 王謹誠
objective:
先修課程：物理或負責教授同意
不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introduction
to Compressible Flow.
schedule:
第 01 週 Introduction 簡介
第 02 週 Fundamental concepts 觀念
第 03 週 Pressure and fluid statics 流體靜力
第 04 週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis 控制體積
第 05 週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第 06 週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第 07 週 Differential analysis of fluid motion 微分分析
第 08 週 Differential analysis of fluid motion
第 09 週 Midterm 期中報告
第 10 週 Incompressible inviscid flow 不可壓縮黏滯流
第 11 週 Dimensional analysis and similarity
第 12 週 Dimensional analysis and similarity
第 13 週 Internal incompressible viscous flow
第 14 週 Internal incompressible viscous flow
第 15 週 External incompressible viscous flow
第 16 週 External incompressible viscous flow
第 17 週 Compressible flow
第 18 週 Final 期末報告
